name: Setup Template
description: Defines reusable defaults for clarinet setup: operations, checklist items, and a list of template tasks. When applied to a Clarinet Initial Setup, this template can populate operations, checklist, and generate scheduled tasks.

fields.label: Template Name
fields.description: Internal identifier for this template (kept unique and set only once).

fields.label: Instrument Model
fields.description: Model this template is designed for (used for pad maps and model-specific defaults).

fields.label: Pad Map
fields.description: Associated pad map record for reference while performing the setup.

fields.label: Default Operations
fields.description: Operations to pre-populate into Clarinet Initial Setup → Operations Performed. Each row describes a standard operation you routinely perform.

fields.label: Checklist Items
fields.description: Checklist rows to pre-populate into Clarinet Initial Setup → Checklist (e.g., safety check, leak test).

fields.label: Template Tasks
fields.description: Task blueprints that generate real Clarinet Setup Tasks (with offsets/durations) when applied on a Clarinet Initial Setup.
